akn:content.akn:p: (b) Report on the mental health needs of individuals with autism spectrum disorder across their lifespan

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Update on young adults and youth transitioning to adulthood

akn:content.akn:p: (c) Update on young adults and youth transitioning to adulthood Not later than 2 years after December 23, 2024, the Secretary, in coordination with other relevant Federal departments and agencies, as appropriate, shall prepare and submit to the Committee on Energy and Commerce of the House of Representatives and the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions of the Senate an update to the report required pursuant to subsection (b) of this section, as added by section 6 of the Autism Cares Act of 2014 (Public Law 113–157), and in effect before September 30, 2019, concerning young adults with autism spectrum disorder and the challenges related to the transition from existing school-based services to those services available during adulthood.
